website_summaries.verdict: The budget-friendly JLab JBuds Air Icon earphones deliver bass-forward audio in a water-resistant, wire-free design.
cons: No way to turn off EQ modes

customer_reviews.title: I wouldnt buy it and return it if I could
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was very impressed by the sound quality considering these are "budget" earbuds. I didn't mind then and now disconnection issues as well, this is a new technology. But I have three problems: 1. It is a pain for a person on the other end a phone call. Microphone takes every sound available... 2. If the volume is a bit high and you are in someplace relatively quiet, people will hear what you are listening. 3. After a while, you cannot ignore the buzz sound coming from them.
customer_reviews.author: Ozan Cem Ozturk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: These earphones fit really well, able to run with them and no issues of them falling out. I especially like that you can use one earphone on its own, if needed. The battery life is amazing, never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Muz

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I listen to audiobooks while running and I am very pleased. They never get disconnected unlike other products I purchased in the past plus the fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: Book Nerd Cafe

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, sound quality and control
customer_reviews.text: Using them every day for few months and so far had no issue with them. Never had them discharged (use them for 5 hours straight), they work for long distance, pair immediately, using touch control is great and have no problem with the sound. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matej Tymes

customer_reviews.title: Good ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to use, only down point is a little on the heavy side..
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E. Birch

customer_reviews.title: Could be better...
customer_reviews.text: Reason for 2 stars is that after a few months of use, the left ear bud completely stopped working for no obvious reason. I couldve bought a replace left ear bud but it cost the same as both earbuds so there was no point and I was done with them. Not very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Premium feel Jlab ear bugs
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear treble ,punchy bass overall excellent sound with the Jlab signature. For the price it's an outstanding piece of ear bug....highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: ah sam ho

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Don t buy if your primary aim is to make phone calls. Buy if you like great sound and long lasting battery life.
customer_reviews.author: kleanthis temiroglou

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than AirPods , but if I had the money I would buy the AirPods
customer_reviews.text: Keep falling out of my ears , I changed the buds several times ... touch controls are not the best either ..
customer_reviews.author: William milliken

customer_reviews.title: Survived the wash
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, mine accidentally went through the wash and work pretty much fine. Big up JLab
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Thierry

product_meta.title: JLab Audio JBuds Air Icon True Wireless Signature Bluetooth Earbuds + Charging Case - Black & Gold - IP55 Sweat Resistance - Bluetooth 5.0 Connection - Stereo Phone Calls - 3 EQ Sound Settings
product_meta.description:
GO Bold.

The JBuds Air Icon offer an upgraded experience to the #1 true wireless earbud under $100* with a longer 24+-hour battery life. Each earbud holds 6 hours and an additional 18+ hours in the case. Now with touch sensors to control your music, and stereo calling for crystal clear audio in both earbuds, JBuds Air Icon feature a sleek gold logo to complete the innovative design.

*JBuds Air True Wireless. The NPD Group, Inc., U.S. Retail Tracking Service, Stereo Headphones, Bluetooth Capable, No wire/no band, Oct. 2018-Feb. 2019

Long Playtime

The earbuds feature 6 hours of playtime with 18+ extra hours in the case. JBuds Air Icon automatically charge when placed in the case, which recharges with the integrated patent-pending USB cable.

Stereo Calling

The JBuds Air Icon feature an upgraded microphone with stereo audio for calls. Hear crystal clear conversations in both ears anywhere, anytime.

Easy Connect & Controls

The earbuds will automatically turn on and connect to each other right out of the case. Then just connect to your phone. Utilizing Bluetooth 5, this is our fastest hands-free connection yet. Plus, touch sensors to control all your music, calls and smart assistants with just a tap or hold.

Custom EQ3 Sound

Choose the sound to match your personal preference between three options: JLab Signature, Balanced and Bass Boost modes -without an app.

Everyday Proof

An IP55 sweat resistance helps the earbuds hold up against moisture and dirt so you never have to worry during any hobby, travel, or workout. Extra eartips and Cush Fins help keep the comfort perfect and reliable for your everyday needs.

Pocket Size

Compact, but sturdy, the JBuds Air included charging case will fit in any bag or jacket pocket you’re taking on-the-GO with you. Lights on the outside will indicate how much power you have left.
feature_bullets: Long Playtime: The earbuds feature 6 hours of playtime with 18+ extra hours in the case. JBuds Air Icon automatically charge when placed in the case, which recharges with the integrated patent-pending USB cable.

Stereo Calling & Custom EQ3 Sound: The JBuds Air Icon feature an upgraded microphone with stereo audio for calls. Hear crystal clear conversations in both ears anywhere, anytime. Choose the sound to match your personal preference between three options: JLab Signature, Balanced and Bass Boost modes -without an app.

Easy Connect & Controls: The earbuds will automatically turn on and connect to each other right out of the case. Then just connect to your phone. Utilizing Bluetooth 5, this is our fastest hands-free connection yet. Plus, touch sensors to control all your music, calls and smart assistants with just a tap or hold.

Everyday Proof: An IP55 sweat resistance helps the earbuds hold up against moisture and dirt so you never have to worry during any hobby, travel, or workout. Extra eartips and Cush Fins help keep the comfort perfect and reliable for your everyday needs.

Pocket Size: Compact, but sturdy, the JBuds Air Icon included charging case will fit in any bag or jacket pocket you’re taking on-the-GO with you. Lights on the outside will indicate how much power you have left before your next charge.
